overview: With people around the country celebrating the birth of Lord Ganesha and bringing the Ganesha idols at their homes, there can't be a better way to kickstart the festivities than this National Geographic documentary. This 43-minute documentary gives us a sneak-peek into the history, behind-the-scenes workings, culture and traditions of the famous Lalbagh Cha Raja in Mumbai.
title: Megafestivals: Ganpati
